title: North-bound service delay due to train fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 火车故障导致北行列车延误
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan arah utara tertangguh kerana kerosakan kereta api
title_translations.ta: ரயில் கோளாறு காரணமாக வடக்கு திசை சேவை தாமதம்

updates.text: Train services on all lines are smooth.Enjoy you day!
North-bound service from Marina Bay to Bishan slightly delayed due to train fault. Please allow extra time for travel.
